data.actual_result: The permissions tab grays out the screen entirely after removing your user profile
data.expected_result: You get a warning before you delete your user profile that it would revoke permissions, or the permissions tab would close out after it revokes them
data.short_description: Revoking your permission to edit permissions (via user profile deletion) grays the screen completely
data.steps_to_repro: - In a server you do not own OR have Administrator permissions in, have a channel you can manage permissions in - Edit the permissions so that your individual user has permissions to manage permissions, while all other roles you have DO NOT. - Delete your individual  user permission profile
